compounddef.title: Load and Run the cFE Core and cFE Applications

Transfer the cFE Applications and Startup File to the Target Non-Volatile Disk

detaileddescription.para: There are a handful of steps to running the cFE Core and cFE Applications on a given platform:

para.ref: Load the cFE Core Executable on the Target
Transfer the cFE Applications and Startup File to the Target Non-Volatile Disk
Description of Fields in the Startup script
Start the cFE Core on the Target
